verbs.description: [ARG0: California Rep. Maxine Waters ( D )] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARG1: that the impeachment of President Trump is the " only option " for Democrats in the wake of his decision to exit the Iran nuclear agreement] .

California Rep. Maxine Waters ( D ) said Wednesday that [ARG1: the impeachment of President Trump] [V: is] [ARG2: the " only option " for Democrats] [ARGM-TMP: in the wake of his decision to exit the Iran nuclear agreement] .

California Rep. Maxine Waters ( D ) said Wednesday that the impeachment of President Trump is the " only option " for [ARG0: Democrats] in the wake of his decision to [V: exit] [ARG1: the Iran nuclear agreement] .
